page.title: 07RAYNESWAY INDUSTRIES
page.content: Raynesway's first works to open was{ {Micrafine,}still the world's largest micra powder producer.The city's {incinerator}destroys 150 tonnes/hour 5 days/week.{British Telecom}Computer Centre prepares telephone accounts for 5 million people and works round the clock.{Rolls Royce and Associates}have an expanding top secret business in the design of power units for nuclear submarines.{BOC}have a distribution centre for a range of gases.{Bemrose} produce patterns to transfer print onto fabrics.{Severn Trent,}the largest water authority, have offices here.They spend Â£1m/day on provision of clean water,treatment of sewage,and care of rivers.Some small firms share units-{a clocksmith,joiners}and various dealers share one building. There are also {engineers}and the{ {Midland Motor}(vehicle){Auctions.
